quoteContent: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.
author: Thomas Edison

quoteContent: You can observe a lot just by watching.
author: Yogi Berra

quoteContent: A house divided against itself cannot stand.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quoteContent: Difficulties increase the nearer we get to the goal.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quoteContent: Fate is in your hands and no one elses
author: Byron Pulsifer

quoteContent: Be the chief but never the lord.
author: Lao Tzu

quoteContent: Nothing happens unless first we dream.
author: Carl Sandburg

quoteContent: Well begun is half done.
author: Aristotle

quoteContent: Life is a learning experience, only if you learn.
author: Yogi Berra

quoteContent: Self-complacency is fatal to progress.
author: Margaret Sangster

quoteContent: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
author: Buddha

quoteContent: What you give is what you get.
author: Byron Pulsifer

quoteContent: We can only learn to love by loving.
author: Iris Murdoch

quoteContent: Life is change. Growth is optional. Choose wisely.
author: Karen Clark

quoteContent: You'll see it when you believe it.
author: Wayne Dyer

quoteContent: Today is the tomorrow we worried about yesterday.
author: Dale Carnegie

quoteContent: It's easier to see the mistakes on someone else's paper.
author: Cynthia Lewis

quoteContent: Every man dies. Not every man really lives.
author: William Wallace

quoteContent: To lead people walk behind them.
author: Lao Tzu

quoteContent: Having nothing, nothing can he lose.
author: William Shakespeare

quoteContent: Trouble is only opportunity in work clothes.
author: Henry J. Kaiser

quoteContent: A rolling stone gathers no moss.
author: Publilius Syrus

quoteContent: Ideas are the beginning points of all fortunes.
author: Napoleon Hill

quoteContent: Everything in life is luck.
author: Donald Trump

quoteContent: Doing nothing is better than being busy doing nothing.
author: Lao Tzu

quoteContent: Trust yourself. You know more than you think you do.
author: Benjamin Spock

quoteContent: Study the past, if you would divine the future.
author: Confucius

quoteContent: The day is already blessed, find peace within it.
author: iQuote Publishing

quoteContent: From error to error one discovers the entire truth.
author: Sigmund Freud

quoteContent: Well done is better than well said.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quoteContent: Bite off more than you can chew, then chew it.
author: Ella Williams

quoteContent: Work out your own salvation. Do not depend on others.
author: Buddha

quoteContent: One today is worth two tomorrows.
author: Benjamin Franklin
